data.body: Do you want to create a basic calculator in JavaScript?
Create a function for each operation (e.g., addition, subtraction, multiplication, division).
Create a select element to allow the user to choose the operation they want to perform.
Create input fields for the numbers being operated.
The first function will take two parameters (num1 and num2) and return their sum.
The second function will take two parameters (num1 and num2) and return their difference.
The third function will take two parameters (num1 and num2) and return their product.
The fourth function will take two parameters (num1 and num2) and return their quotient.
With these steps, you can create a basic calculator in JavaScript that allows users to perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division operations!
